results.description: Aleksandar Mitrovic punishes keeper Lee Camp's error as Fulham win at Birmingham City in the Championship.
results.shortTitle: Fulham beat Birmingham after Camp error
results.title: Birmingham 0-1 Fulham: Lee Camp error hands win to visitors

thumbnail.altText: Fulham striker Aleksandar Mitrovic - the Championship's top scorer - has now netted 12 goals this season

results.description: Striker Timmy Abraham - brother of Chelsea forward Tammy - is the hero for Fulham Under-21s in a 2-1 EFL Trophy victory at Wycombe.
results.shortTitle: Abraham nets for Fulham in EFL Trophy
results.title: EFL Trophy: Timmy Abraham nets for Fulham as brother Tammy scores Chelsea own goal

results.description: Hull City make it three Championship victories in a row with a clinical display against an out-of-sorts Fulham side.
results.title: Fulham 0-3 Hull City: Jarrod Bowen scores 10th goal of season as Tigers win

results.description: Middlesbrough sink into the bottom three in the Championship after being held to a draw by 10-man Fulham.
results.shortTitle: Boro held to draw by 10-man Fulham
results.title: Middlesbrough 0-0 Fulham: Boro held despite Marek Rodak red card

thumbnail.altText: Rodak made his league debut for Fulham just three days earlier against Luton

results.description: One of the first training videos for players, with Fulham players Bert Barrett and Len Oliver.
results.title: The Finer Points Of Football

results.description: Championship top scorer Aleksandar Mitrovic hits his first Fulham hat-trick to finish off Luton Town at Craven Cottage.
results.shortTitle: Mitrovic treble for Fulham floors Luton
results.title: Fulham 3-2 Luton Town: Aleksandar Mitrovic hat-trick too good for Hatters

thumbnail.altText: Aleksandar Mitrovic has now scored 32 goals for Fulham since first arriving from Newcastle United in February 2018

results.description: Stoke City move off the bottom of the Championship table as they make it back-to-back victories by beating Fulham.
results.shortTitle: Stoke beat Fulham to move off bottom
results.title: Stoke City 2-0 Fulham: Tyrese Campbell scores first league goal in Potters victory

results.description: Fulham twice come from behind to draw a pulsating London derby against Charlton Athletic at Craven Cottage.
results.shortTitle: Fulham twice come back to deny Charlton
results.title: Fulham 2-2 Charlton Athletic: Aleksandar Mitrovic scores again in Cottagers draw

results.description: Relive the action from the EFL as West Brom go top of the Championship and Stoke and AFC Wimbledon earn their first wins of the season.
results.title: Saturday's EFL action as it happened

results.description: Aleksandar Mitrovic and Tom Cairney both score twice as Fulham earn a comprehensive away victory over Reading.
results.shortTitle: Fulham cruise to win at 10-man Reading
results.title: Reading 1-4 Fulham: Aleksandar Mitrovic & Tom Cairney star against 10-man Royals

results.description: Fulham gain a deserved win over Wigan thanks to Joe Bryan and Tom Cairney's second-half strikes at Craven Cottage.
results.shortTitle: Fulham beat Wigan to end winless streak
results.title: Fulham 2-0 Wigan Athletic: Joe Bryan and Tom Cairney goals give hosts victory

results.description: Nottingham Forest hang on to beat Stoke and go top of the Championship - relive the action as it happened.
results.shortTitle: Relive how Forest went top of the Championship
results.title: EFL: Stoke City 2-3 Nottingham Forest, Fulham 2-0 Wigan Athletic as it happened

results.description: Substitute Atdhe Nuhiu's 93rd-minute goal earns Sheffield Wednesday a point against Fulham.
results.title: Sheffield Wednesday 1-1 Fulham: Late Nuhiu header saves point for Owls

results.description: Semi Ajayi's controversial late equaliser maintains West Brom's unbeaten league record after Anthony Knockaert's fortuitous opener for Fulham.
results.shortTitle: Baggies stay unbeaten after Ajayi leveller at Fulham
results.title: Fulham 1-1 West Brom: Baggies stay unbeaten after Ajayi leveller at Fulham

thumbnail.altText: Semi Ajayi's West Bromwich Albion equaliser was his first goal for the club.

results.description: Championship side Fulham agree a deal to sign Chelsea defender Michael Hector in January 2020.
results.shortTitle: Fulham to sign Hector from Chelsea
results.title: Michael Hector: Chelsea defender to join Fulham in January

thumbnail.altText: Michael Hector in action for Jamaica

results.description: Real Mallorca sign Fulham goalkeeper Fabri on a season-long loan deal.
results.shortTitle: Fulham keeper Fabri joins Real Mallorca
results.title: Fabri: Real Mallorca sign Fulham goalkeeper on season-long loan deal

results.description: Accrington sign Preston striker Connor Simpson, West Ham centre-back Aji Alese and Fulham defender Jerome Opoku on loan.
results.title: Accrington Stanley sign Connor Simpson, Aji Alese & Jerome Opoku on loan

results.description: Harry Arter is sent off on his return to Cardiff as 10-man Fulham hold on for a draw in the Championship.
results.title: Cardiff City 1-1 Fulham: Harry Arter sent off as visitors hold on for draw

results.description: Cardiff City draw with Fulham, who had Harry Arter sent off midway through the second half - relive the action.
results.title: Cardiff City 1-1 Fulham in the Championship as it happened

results.description: Teenager Michael Obafemi earns Southampton a place in the EFL Cup third round after hitting the winner at Championship Fulham.
results.shortTitle: Obafemi hits Saints' winner against Fulham
results.title: Fulham 0-1 Southampton: Teenager Michael Obafemi hits Saints winner

thumbnail.altText: Southampton's Michael Obafemi celebrates scoring for Southampton against Fulham in the Carabao Cup
